Replace.Text: Pachacuti is pleased you have few cities near Mountains
Pachacuti is displeased because you have many cities near Mountains
Dido is pleased you have few coastal cities
Dido is displeased because you have many coastal cities
They like Empires that claim a lot of land, and dislike those that do not
They like Empires with significant navies
They dislike those who try to leave the Earth
They do not like you competing so actively for Favor
They are happy you are not earning much Favor
They are unhappy that your Tourism is so strong
They are pleased you are not competing in Tourism
They are happy you share a religion
They are angry that your religion is present in their empire
They are angry that you are getting closer to a Diplomatic Victory
They are pleased you are not a threat for Diplomatic Victory
They are pleased to see another civilization who enjoys pillaging
They would like to see you pillage opponents more often
